author: pietverwilligen
body:
This Pull Request creates two geometries:
- Ideal2015Muon
- Extended2015Muon
  both contain all the Phase-2 Muon upgrades: ME0, GE1/1, GE2/1, RE3/1, RE4/1 on top of 
  the Run-2 geometry, and without ECAL and HCAL.  

This PR allows the integration of the Muon Upgrade code in 75X, because
now there is a geometry in which ME0 is included.

While testing the Geometry I noticed that the ME0 SimHits were not produced, therefore also a modification to the OscarProducer was necessary. ME0 Pseudo-Digis are not yet produced / kept, but that will be for another PR.

Please test and sign.
Thanks
Piet
title: Ideal geometry2015 muon
